name: MLTextClassifier.ModelParameters.ValidationData
desc: The validation data that a text classifier uses.

items.name: case split(strategy: MLSplitStrategy)
items.desc: Generates the validation data by splitting the training dataset.

items.name: case table(MLDataTable, textColumn: String, labelColumn: String)
items.desc: Sets the validation data from the provided data table.

items.name: case dataSource(MLTextClassifier.DataSource)
items.desc: Sets the validation data from the provided data source.

items.name: case dictionary([String : [String]])
items.desc: Sets the validation data from the provided dictionary.
